world.name: Sinister Lane
world.description: A narrow, grimy lane of sagging houses and leaning streetlamps. Crows sometimes perch on the wires. It connects Count Olaf's dilapidated home to Justice Strauss's tidy townhouse.

OLAF.short_desc: Count Olaf's Front Steps - cracked concrete with flaking paint and an eye symbol
OLAF.traversal: You walk east down the grimy lane toward the dilapidated house, crows cawing from overhead wires.

JUSTICE.short_desc: Justice Strauss's Garden - neatly trimmed hedges and a cobblestone path
JUSTICE.traversal: You head west toward the well-maintained garden, leaving the squalor behind for manicured hedges.

CITY.short_desc: City Street - a busier avenue with shops and public transit
CITY.traversal: You walk north toward the busier city street, the sounds of commerce growing louder.

ENTER.short_desc: Count Olaf's Living Room - cluttered, dusty theater production space
ENTER.traversal: You push through the crooked door into the musty interior, dust motes swirling in the dim light.

world.name: Count Olaf: Front Steps
world.description: Cracked concrete steps with flaking paint and an eye symbol chalked on the stoop. The door hangs crooked on its hinges.

ENTER.short_desc: Count Olaf's Living Room - cluttered theater production space with stained curtains
ENTER.traversal: You push through the crooked door into the cluttered living room, cold soup smell hitting your nostrils.

LANE.short_desc: Sinister Lane - grimy lane connecting the dilapidated houses
LANE.traversal: You step back onto the grimy lane, crows watching from their perches on sagging wires.

world.name: Count Olaf: Living Room
world.description: A cluttered, dusty room used for ill-rehearsed theater productions; mismatched chairs, stained curtains, and the faint smell of cold soup.

KITCHEN.short_desc: Count Olaf's Kitchen - greasy counters and a leaning icebox
KITCHEN.traversal: You move west toward the kitchen, the smell of grease and neglect growing stronger.

TOWER.short_desc: Count Olaf's Tower - narrow, drafty space with barred windows
TOWER.traversal: You climb the creaking stairs up to the tower, each step groaning under your weight.

EXIT.short_desc: Sinister Lane - the grimy street outside
EXIT.traversal: You escape through the front door back onto Sinister Lane, grateful for the fresh air.

STEPS.short_desc: Count Olaf's Front Steps - cracked concrete with the chalked eye symbol
STEPS.traversal: You step outside to the cracked front steps, the eye symbol staring up at you.

world.name: Count Olaf: Kitchen
world.description: Greasy counters and a leaning icebox. Knives are dull, pots dented; children are expected to cook elaborate meals here.

GARDEN.short_desc: Count Olaf's Backyard Garden - scraggly weeds and broken statuary
GARDEN.traversal: You step south through the back door into the neglected garden, weeds crunching underfoot.

LIVING.short_desc: Count Olaf's Living Room - the cluttered theater space
LIVING.traversal: You return east to the living room, leaving the kitchen's greasy chaos behind.

items.name: Dull Knife
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Count Olaf: Kitchen, you notice a Dull Knife where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

items.name: Dented Pot
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Count Olaf: Kitchen, you notice a Dented Pot where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

items.name: Greasy Apron
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Count Olaf: Kitchen, you notice a Greasy Apron where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

world.name: Count Olaf: Tower
world.description: A narrow, drafty tower with barred windows and a rope coil. It is more prison than bedroom.

DOWN.short_desc: Count Olaf's Living Room - back to the cluttered theater space below
DOWN.traversal: You descend the creaking stairs back to the living room, leaving the drafty prison behind.

items.name: Coil of Rope
items.notice: While adjusting to the light in Count Olaf: Tower, you spot a Coil of Rope hanging from a hook near the shadows.

items.name: Barred Window
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Count Olaf: Tower, you notice a Barred Window where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

items.name: Old Curtain
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Count Olaf: Tower, you notice a Old Curtain where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

world.name: Count Olaf: Backyard Garden
world.description: A scraggly patch of weeds, broken statuary, and a rickety fence painted with a staring eye.

KITCHEN.short_desc: Count Olaf's Kitchen - greasy counters and dented cookware
KITCHEN.traversal: You head north back through the kitchen door, leaving the weedy garden behind.

world.name: Justice Strauss: Garden
world.description: Neatly trimmed hedges, a cobblestone path, and a small arbor dripping with vines—an oasis beside the squalor next door.

LIBRARY.short_desc: Justice Strauss's Library - warm light on well-loved books
LIBRARY.traversal: You follow the cobblestone path to the library door, the smell of tea and old books beckoning.

LANE.short_desc: Sinister Lane - back to the grimy street between houses
LANE.traversal: You reluctantly leave the manicured garden for the grimy lane, the contrast jarring.

world.name: Justice Strauss: Library
world.description: Warm light on rows of well-loved books, a ladder on rails, and a cushioned reading window that smells faintly of tea.

GARDEN.short_desc: Justice Strauss's Garden - the peaceful arbor and cobblestone path
GARDEN.traversal: You step back into the garden, leaving the warm library for the vine-covered arbor.

items.name: Law Book
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Justice Strauss: Library, you notice a Law Book where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

items.name: Dictionary
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Justice Strauss: Library, you notice a Dictionary where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

items.name: Rolling Ladder
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Justice Strauss: Library, you notice a Rolling Ladder where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

npcs.name: Justice Strauss
npcs.dialogue: Oh, my dears! Take any book, but mind the index.
npcs.flavor: She adjusts her glasses and smiles whenever you handle books gently.

world.name: City Street
world.description: A busier avenue with shops with 'IN' and 'OUT' signs switching by the week; leads to apartments and public transit.

JUNCTION.short_desc: Regional Rail Junction - soot-smudged platform where uncertain journeys begin
JUNCTION.traversal: You head north toward the rail junction, the sound of distant trains growing louder.

DOWNTOWN.short_desc: Unmarked Coach Road - rutted earth used by theatrical troupes
DOWNTOWN.traversal: You turn north onto the unmarked coach road, leaving the city bustle behind.

AVENUE.short_desc: City Avenue of In/Out - fashionable boulevard where citizens adopt trends
AVENUE.traversal: You walk east toward the fashionable avenue, boutique signs glinting in the distance.

SNICKET.short_desc: Snicket Block - quiet townhouses with cats on windowsills
SNICKET.traversal: You turn east onto the quieter block, cats watching from their windowsill perches.

LANE.short_desc: Sinister Lane - the grimy street between Count Olaf's and Justice Strauss's homes
LANE.traversal: You head south down the grimy lane, leaving the busier street behind.

world.name: Regional Rail Junction
world.description: A soot-smudged platform web where many uncertain journeys begin; lines stretch toward towns, mountains, and the sea.

DESERT.short_desc: Desert Road - dusty ribbon leading to carnival and mountains
DESERT.traversal: You board the southbound train toward the desert, dust already visible on the horizon.

SCHOOL.short_desc: School Road - cracked sidewalk with thorny hedges
SCHOOL.traversal: You take the southern line toward the school district, hedges growing thicker along the tracks.

HOSPITAL.short_desc: Hospital Drive - bleak driveway with dying hedges and optimistic signs
HOSPITAL.traversal: You board the southbound line toward the hospital, medical signs becoming more frequent.

CITY.short_desc: City Street - busier avenue with shops and changing 'IN/OUT' signs
CITY.traversal: You head south back into the city proper, commerce sounds growing louder.

AVENUE.short_desc: City Avenue of In/Out - fashionable boulevard of adopted trends
AVENUE.traversal: You walk south toward the fashionable shopping district, boutique windows gleaming.

COAST.short_desc: Coastal Road - following the gnashing line of surf
COAST.traversal: You take the western line toward the coast, salt air already reaching your nostrils.

STAINED.short_desc: Train Station: Ironhaven - rust-colored platform by the quarry pit
STAINED.traversal: You board the eastbound train toward Ironhaven, the landscape growing more scarred and industrial.

CROW.short_desc: Crow Road - white with droppings at dawn, black with birds at dusk
CROW.traversal: You head north along the crow-haunted road, wings rustling overhead.

HOTEL.short_desc: Hotel Drive - sweeping approach reflecting the building in puddles
HOTEL.traversal: You take the northern line toward the hotel, its imposing silhouette visible in the distance.

world.name: Country Road
world.description: A gravel road bordered by fields and the occasional heron. It connects the city to a warm, herpetological home.

MONTY.short_desc: Uncle Monty's Foyer - coat pegs, rubber boots, and scientific kindness
MONTY.traversal: You walk south down the gravel road to Uncle Monty's house, scientific specimens visible through the windows.

COACH.short_desc: Unmarked Coach Road - rutted earth threading between distant towns
COACH.traversal: You turn east onto the coach road, theatrical posters fluttering from fence posts.

world.name: Uncle Monty: Foyer
world.description: Coat pegs, rubber boots by the door, and the comforting sense that science may yet be kind.

REPTILES.short_desc: Uncle Monty's Reptile Room - steam-warm air with rows of terrariums
REPTILES.traversal: You head east toward the reptile room, the warm, humid air and soft sounds of life beckoning.

KITCHEN.short_desc: Uncle Monty's Kitchen - bright space with citrus and a singing kettle
KITCHEN.traversal: You walk west to the bright kitchen, the scent of citrus and promise of tea drawing you in.

ROAD.short_desc: Country Road - gravel path bordered by fields and herons
ROAD.traversal: You step north back onto the country road, leaving the welcoming house behind.

npcs.name: Dr. Montgomery
npcs.dialogue: Science is a lamp in a very dark room. Mind the snakes.
npcs.flavor: His eyes light up at proper fieldwork and labeled jars.

world.name: Uncle Monty: Reptile Room
world.description: Steam-warm air hugs rows of terrariums: snakes slither, frogs blink, and specimen jars glint with labels in tidy handwriting.

FOYER.short_desc: Uncle Monty's Foyer - coat pegs and the comfort of scientific kindness
FOYER.traversal: You return west to the foyer, leaving the warm reptile sanctuary behind.

items.name: Specimen Jar
items.notice: A chemical tang in Uncle Monty: Reptile Room draws you to a shelf where a Specimen Jar sits half-concealed.

check.notes: Chemical smell or labels can guide you.

items.name: Snake Hook
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Uncle Monty: Reptile Room, you notice a Snake Hook where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

items.name: Field Notes
items.notice: Leafing through a stack of papers in Uncle Monty: Reptile Room, you notice the edge of a Field Notes that doesn't quite match the others.

check.notes: Sorting papers, checking spines and misfiled edges helps.

world.name: Uncle Monty: Kitchen
world.description: A bright kitchen with citrus in a bowl and a kettle that always seems about to sing.

GARDEN.short_desc: Uncle Monty's Garden - banana trees and netted lizard pens
GARDEN.traversal: You step south into the garden, exotic plants and unusual lizards basking in filtered sunlight.

FOYER.short_desc: Uncle Monty's Foyer - entrance with scientific promise
FOYER.traversal: You return east to the welcoming foyer, the sound of the kettle following you.

world.name: Uncle Monty: Garden
world.description: Stamped-earth paths around banana trees and netted pens where unusual lizards sun themselves.

KITCHEN.short_desc: Uncle Monty's Kitchen - bright space with citrus and singing kettle
KITCHEN.traversal: You head north back to the bright kitchen, leaving the exotic garden sanctuary.

world.name: Clifftop Path
world.description: Wind-shaved limestone steps with a railing that screams in a storm. The path ends in a house that clings to the cliff.

JOSEPHINE.short_desc: Aunt Josephine's Living Room - lace doilies and forbidding hazard notices
JOSEPHINE.traversal: You follow the treacherous path east to the cliff house, windows rattling ominously over the grey lake.

world.name: Aunt Josephine: Living Room
world.description: A room of lace doilies and forbidding notices about every imaginable hazard; windows rattle over the grey lake.

STUDY.short_desc: Aunt Josephine's Study - towering grammar texts and perfectly sharpened pencils
STUDY.traversal: You head north to the study, the sound of pages and pencils promising grammatical precision.

KITCHEN.short_desc: Aunt Josephine's Kitchen - unplugged appliances labeled DANGEROUS
KITCHEN.traversal: You move west to the kitchen, every appliance ominously unplugged and labeled.

PATH.short_desc: Clifftop Path - wind-shaved limestone steps with screaming railing
PATH.traversal: You step west back onto the clifftop path, leaving the nervous house behind.

PORCH.short_desc: Aunt Josephine's Porch - precarious platform jutting over whitecaps
PORCH.traversal: You venture south onto the precarious porch, Lake Lachrymose churning far below.

world.name: Aunt Josephine: Kitchen
world.description: Appliances unplugged and labeled DANGEROUS; the pantry bulges with cold tins of food.

LIVING.short_desc: Aunt Josephine's Living Room - lace doilies and hazard warnings
LIVING.traversal: You return east to the living room, past the collection of nervous notices.

world.name: Aunt Josephine: Study
world.description: Towering grammar texts, a desk with perfectly sharpened pencils, and a dictionary set like an altar.

LIVING.short_desc: Aunt Josephine's Living Room - back to the doilies and danger signs
LIVING.traversal: You head south back to the living room, leaving the grammatical sanctuary behind.

items.name: Grammar Text
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Aunt Josephine: Study, you notice a Grammar Text where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

items.name: Fountain Pen
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Aunt Josephine: Study, you notice a Fountain Pen where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

items.name: Dictionary
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Aunt Josephine: Study, you notice a Dictionary where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

world.name: Aunt Josephine: Porch
world.description: A precarious porch jutting above the whitecaps of Lake Lachrymose.

SHORE.short_desc: Lake Lachrymose Shore - pebbly, windblown with ominous leech warnings
SHORE.traversal: You carefully climb down to the shore, 'NO SWIMMING (LEECHES)' signs growing more prominent.

LIVING.short_desc: Aunt Josephine's Living Room - safety of doilies and warnings
LIVING.traversal: You retreat north back into the relative safety of the living room.

world.name: Lake Lachrymose: Shore
world.description: Pebbly, windblown shore with bleached driftwood and ominous 'NO SWIMMING (LEECHES)' signs.

CAVES.short_desc: Lake Lachrymose Caves - damp limestone hollows smelling of secrets
CAVES.traversal: You venture east into the limestone caves, echoes bouncing strangely off the walls.

PORCH.short_desc: Aunt Josephine's Porch - precarious platform above the whitecaps
PORCH.traversal: You climb back up to the precarious porch, leaving the leech-infested waters behind.

COAST.short_desc: Coastal Road - following the gnashing line of surf
COAST.traversal: You head west along the coastal road, tire ruts and crow prints marking the way.

items.name: Fishing Line
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Lake Lachrymose: Shore, you notice a Fishing Line where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

items.name: Life Preserver
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Lake Lachrymose: Shore, you notice a Life Preserver where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

world.name: Lake Lachrymose: Caves
world.description: Damp limestone hollows smelling of salt and secrets. Echoes do not always return the truth.

SHORE.short_desc: Lake Lachrymose Shore - back to the windblown shore and leech warnings
SHORE.traversal: You emerge west from the caves back to the pebbly shore, grateful for the open air.

world.name: Coastal Road
world.description: A road that follows the gnashing line of surf; it bears tire ruts, crow prints, and uneasy memories.

SEA.short_desc: Sea Route - treacherous span plied by dinghies and dubious lessons
SEA.traversal: You head south toward open water, dubious moral lessons echoing across the waves.

LAKE.short_desc: Lake Lachrymose Shore - pebbly shore with leech warnings
LAKE.traversal: You turn east toward the lake shore, warning signs becoming more prominent.

JUNCTION.short_desc: Regional Rail Junction - soot-smudged platform web of uncertain journeys
JUNCTION.traversal: You head east back toward the rail junction, the sound of trains growing louder.

STREAM.short_desc: Stricken Stream Dock - wavering pier over waters that aren't clean
STREAM.traversal: You turn north toward the stream dock, the water looking deceptively clean.

world.name: Paltryville Road
world.description: A long, splintered road lined with billboards for gum and eyewear, all slightly crooked.

MILL.short_desc: Lucky Smells Mill Floor - sawdust fog and shrieking blades
MILL.traversal: You head south toward the mill, the sound of sawing and the scent of wood shavings growing stronger.

COACH.short_desc: Unmarked Coach Road - rutted earth threading between towns
COACH.traversal: You turn east onto the coach road, billboard advertisements giving way to empty fields.

world.name: Lucky Smells: Mill Floor
world.description: Sawdust fog, shrieking blades, and the whisper of stamped coupons instead of wages.

OFFICE.short_desc: Lucky Smells Foreman Office - metal desk and clipboard of punishments
OFFICE.traversal: You head east to the foreman's office, the clipboard of violations visible through the window.

BUNKS.short_desc: Lucky Smells Bunks - sagging beds with wood glue smell
BUNKS.traversal: You walk north to the workers' bunks, the smell of wood glue and exhaustion heavy in the air.

ROAD.short_desc: Paltryville Road - splintered road with crooked billboards
ROAD.traversal: You head north back to the billboard-lined road, leaving the industrial chaos behind.

items.name: Wood Shavings
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Lucky Smells: Mill Floor, you notice a Wood Shavings where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

items.name: Coupon Book
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Lucky Smells: Mill Floor, you notice a Coupon Book where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

world.name: Lucky Smells: Bunks
world.description: Rows of sagging beds with a single dangling bulb and the smell of wood glue.

MILL.short_desc: Lucky Smells Mill Floor - back to the sawdust fog and shrieking blades
MILL.traversal: You head south back to the mill floor, the sound of machinery growing louder again.

world.name: Lucky Smells: Foreman Office
world.description: Metal desk, clipboard of punishments, and a window no one can see out of.

MILL.short_desc: Lucky Smells Mill Floor - back to the workers and sawdust chaos
MILL.traversal: You return west to the mill floor, the foreman's punishments echoing behind you.

world.name: School Road
world.description: A cracked sidewalk bordered by thorny hedges and a sign that says Beatrice was here, which is not strictly helpful.

PRUFROCK.short_desc: Prufrock Entrance - stone archway with mismatched glasses and frown crest
PRUFROCK.traversal: You walk south toward the prep school, its unwelcoming crest visible above the stone archway.

COACH.short_desc: Unmarked Coach Road - rutted earth for theatrical troupes
COACH.traversal: You turn south onto the coach road, leaving the school district behind.

JUNCTION.short_desc: Regional Rail Junction - back to the soot-smudged platform web
JUNCTION.traversal: You head north back to the rail junction, the school's rigid atmosphere lifting behind you.

world.name: Prufrock: Entrance
world.description: Stone archway with the school crest: a mismatched pair of glasses and a frown.

SHACK.short_desc: Prufrock Orphans' Shack - leaning hut with fungus and crabs
SHACK.traversal: You reluctantly head west to the orphans' shack, fungus visible growing in the corners.

LIBRARY.short_desc: Prufrock Library - almost empty stacks with shrieking librarian
LIBRARY.traversal: You walk east to the library, hoping to find the three books actually worth reading.

CAFETERIA.short_desc: Prufrock Cafeteria - grey porridge in grey bowls on grey trays
CAFETERIA.traversal: You head south to the cafeteria, the clatter of cruel cutlery already audible.

ROAD.short_desc: School Road - back to the cracked sidewalk and thorny hedges
ROAD.traversal: You walk north back to the school road, leaving Prufrock's unwelcoming archway behind.

world.name: Prufrock: Orphans' Shack
world.description: A leaning hut with fungus in the corners and crabs under the bed. It does not pass any inspection worth having.

ENTRANCE.short_desc: Prufrock Entrance - back to the stone archway and school crest
ENTRANCE.traversal: You escape east back to the entrance, grateful to leave the fungus-ridden hut.

items.name: Fungus Sample
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Prufrock: Orphans' Shack, you notice a Fungus Sample where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

items.name: Broken Broom
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Prufrock: Orphans' Shack, you notice a Broken Broom where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

world.name: Prufrock: Library
world.description: Almost empty stacks, a shrieking librarian, and three books actually worth reading if you can find them.

OFFICE.short_desc: Prufrock Vice Principal Office - Nero's violins and detention programs
OFFICE.traversal: You head south to the vice principal's office, violin music screeching from within.

ENTRANCE.short_desc: Prufrock Entrance - back to the frowning school crest
ENTRANCE.traversal: You walk west back to the entrance, empty book stacks behind you.

world.name: Prufrock: Cafeteria
world.description: Grey porridge in grey bowls on grey trays. The cutlery is loud enough to be cruel.

ENTRANCE.short_desc: Prufrock Entrance - back to the stone archway
ENTRANCE.traversal: You head north back to the entrance, leaving the grey meals behind.

world.name: Prufrock: Vice Principal Office
world.description: Nero's violins are everywhere; detentions are posted like recital programs.

LIBRARY.short_desc: Prufrock Library - back to the almost empty stacks
LIBRARY.traversal: You head north back to the library, violin music thankfully fading behind you.

world.name: City Avenue of In/Out
world.description: A fashionable boulevard where citizens adopt trends before understanding them.

SQUALOR.short_desc: Squalor Lobby - cavernous space with 'IN' art installations
SQUALOR.traversal: You head south toward the Squalor building, 'IN' art installations becoming more prominent.

JUNCTION.short_desc: Regional Rail Junction - back to the soot-smudged platform web
JUNCTION.traversal: You walk north back to the rail junction, leaving the fashionable trends behind.

CITY.short_desc: City Street - back to the busier avenue with changing signs
CITY.traversal: You head west back to the main city street, boutique windows fading behind you.

world.name: Squalor: Lobby
world.description: A cavernous lobby with 'IN' art installations and a concierge who takes messages but never delivers them.

APARTMENT.short_desc: Squalor Apartment - Jerome & Esmé's sprawling rooms of 'in' items
APARTMENT.traversal: You take the elevator up to the apartment, 'IN' items visible through the brass doors.

SHAFT.blocked_text: The shaft descends into darkness - you'd need climbing equipment to safely navigate it.
SHAFT.short_desc: Squalor Elevator Shaft - dark void where elevators used to be
SHAFT.traversal: You carefully descend into the elevator shaft using your climbing gear, cables hanging like spider silk.

AVENUE.short_desc: City Avenue of In/Out - back to the fashionable boulevard
AVENUE.traversal: You head north back to the fashionable avenue, leaving the 'IN' installations behind.

items.name: Goggles (Spare)
items.notice: You notice a Goggles (Spare) tucked where anyone might find it.

items.name: Backup Rope
items.notice: A bellhop's cart carries a neatly coiled rope.

world.name: Squalor: Elevator Shaft
world.description: A dark, empty void where elevators used to be. Cables hang like spider silk.

LOBBY.blocked_text: You'd need climbing equipment to safely ascend back to the lobby.
LOBBY.short_desc: Squalor Lobby - back up to the cavernous space with 'IN' art
LOBBY.traversal: You carefully climb back up to the lobby, your gear scraping against the shaft walls.

world.name: Squalor: Jerome & Esmé Apartment
world.description: Sprawling rooms full of 'in' items arranged impractically; windows look out onto rumors.

LOBBY.short_desc: Squalor Lobby - back down to the cavernous space below
LOBBY.traversal: You take the elevator down to the lobby, leaving the impractical 'IN' arrangements behind.

items.name: In-Style Magazine
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Squalor: Jerome & Esmé Apartment, you notice a In-Style Magazine where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

items.name: Needlessly Long Cigarette Holder
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around Squalor: Jerome & Esmé Apartment, you notice a Needlessly Long Cigarette Holder where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

world.name: Crow Road
world.description: A road white with droppings at dawn when the crows lift, and black with birds at dusk when they return.

VILLAGE.short_desc: VFD Village Town Square - rule plaques and cawing fountain spectators
VILLAGE.traversal: You head west toward the village, crows lifting from the road to announce your arrival.

JUNCTION.short_desc: Regional Rail Junction - back to the soot-smudged platform web
JUNCTION.traversal: You walk south back to the rail junction, crow droppings crunching under your feet.

world.name: VFD Village: Town Square
world.description: Rule plaques on every post; a fountain surrounded by cawing spectators.

HALL.short_desc: VFD Village Council Hall - long benches and stern portraits
HALL.traversal: You walk north to the council hall, rule plaques giving way to stern portraits of officials.

JAIL.blocked_text: The jail entrance is locked - you'd need proper authorization to enter.
JAIL.short_desc: VFD Village Jailhouse - iron bars and a missing key
JAIL.traversal: You present your credentials and enter the jailhouse, iron bars clanging shut behind you.

CROW.short_desc: Crow Road - back to the white-stained road
CROW.traversal: You head east back to Crow Road, crows following your departure with keen interest.

HECTOR.short_desc: VFD Village Hector's House - tinkerer's paradise of balloons and blueprints
HECTOR.traversal: You walk west to Hector's house, balloon contraptions visible through the windows.

items.name: Writ (Stamped Copy)
items.notice: You notice a Writ (Stamped Copy) tucked where anyone might find it.

items.name: Stamped Writ
items.notice: A notice board has a stamped writ tucked under a thumbtack.

npcs.name: Hector
npcs.dialogue: One day the balloons will lift us above all this noise.
npcs.flavor: He stares at the sky as if it might finally lift him away.

world.name: VFD Village: Council Hall
world.description: Long benches, stern portraits, and a bell that rings more often than it is needed.

SQUARE.short_desc: VFD Village Town Square - back to the rule plaques and cawing fountain
SQUARE.traversal: You head south back to the town square, leaving the stern portraits behind.

items.name: Gavel
items.notice: A scuffed dais in VFD Village: Council Hall reveals a neglected Gavel beneath the bench.

items.name: Rulebook
items.notice: A scuffed dais in VFD Village: Council Hall reveals a neglected Rulebook beneath the bench.

world.name: VFD Village: Jailhouse
world.description: Iron bars and a key that is always missing when justice is required.

SQUARE.blocked_text: You need proper authorization to leave through the main entrance.
SQUARE.short_desc: VFD Village Town Square - back to the fountain and rule plaques
SQUARE.traversal: You present your credentials again and exit the jailhouse, returning to the town square.

items.name: Rusty Bars
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around VFD Village: Jailhouse, you notice a Rusty Bars where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

items.name: Cotteny Blanket
items.notice: Taking a moment to look around VFD Village: Jailhouse, you notice a Cotteny Blanket where the dust doesn't settle quite right.

world.name: VFD Village: Hector's House
world.description: A tinkerer's paradise of balloons, contraptions, and blueprints for impossible freedom.

SQUARE.short_desc: VFD Village Town Square - back to the fountain and rule plaques
SQUARE.traversal: You step east back to the town square, balloon contraptions and blueprints behind you.

world.name: Hospital Drive
world.description: A bleak driveway edged with dying hedges and optimistic signage.

HEIMLICH.short_desc: Heimlich Lobby - flickering fluorescents and pamphlets that cure nothing
HEIMLICH.traversal: You walk east up the hospital driveway, optimistic signage giving way to flickering fluorescents.

JUNCTION.short_desc: Regional Rail Junction - back to the soot-smudged platform web
JUNCTION.traversal: You head north back to the rail junction, leaving the dying hedges behind.

world.name: Heimlich: Lobby

world.name: Company Security Office
world.description: A steel desk, a whistle, and a handbook of company violations.

STREET.short_desc: Main Street (Ironhaven) - back to the shuttered storefronts
STREET.traversal: You walk east back to Main Street, leaving the handbook of violations behind.

npcs.name: The Mitchums
npcs.dialogue: Paperwork first, justice later. Usually much later.
npcs.flavor: They trust paperwork and nothing else—especially not you.

world.name: Drafting & Supply
world.description: A shop selling the tools for meticulous blueprints and excellent forgeries.

STREET.short_desc: Main Street (Ironhaven) - back to the shuttered storefronts and creaking signs
STREET.traversal: You walk south back to Main Street, tools for truth and lies tucked safely away.

world.name: The Great Quarry Pit
world.description: The excavated earth—a cracked plain of rust-colored dirt and slag, where derelict mining equipment sits like skeletons.

PATH.short_desc: Quarry Catwalk - winding footpath of steel mesh and cables
PATH.traversal: You follow the winding catwalk south across the quarry, steel mesh groaning under derelict machinery.

STREET.short_desc: Main Street (Ironhaven) - back to the shuttered storefronts
STREET.traversal: You step north back onto Main Street, leaving the skeletal machines and rust-colored plains behind.

world.name: Quarry Catwalk
world.description: A winding footpath of steel mesh and cables crossing the Great Pit to the far edges of town.

MAW.short_desc: The Great Quarry Pit - back to the rust-colored plains and skeletal machines
MAW.traversal: You follow the catwalk north back across the Pit, steel mesh and cables guiding your way.

GENERATOR.short_desc: Geothermal Relay Station - squat concrete building with eight pictographs
GENERATOR.traversal: You walk east across the quarry floor to the concrete building, eight pictographs visible above the ajar doorway.

world.name: Unmarked Coach Road
world.description: Rutted earth road used by theatrical troupes and worse, threading between distant towns.

CITY.short_desc: City Street - back to the busier avenue with 'IN/OUT' signs
CITY.traversal: You head south back to the city street, leaving the theatrical posters fluttering behind you.

PALTRYVILLE.short_desc: Paltryville Road - splintered road with crooked billboards
PALTRYVILLE.traversal: You turn west onto Paltryville Road, billboards advertising gum and eyewear sprouting from the roadside.

COUNTRY.short_desc: Country Road - gravel path to herpetological home
COUNTRY.traversal: You head west onto the gravel country road, herons visible in the distant fields.

SCHOOL.short_desc: School Road - cracked sidewalk with thorny hedges
SCHOOL.traversal: You turn north toward the school road, thorny hedges gradually replacing theatrical posters.

world.name: The Iron Mug Diner: Attic
world.description: A low, dust-choked space of rafters, burlap supply sacks, and a dormer window overlooking the quarry pit. Hidden ledgers are known to slip between floorboards.

COFFEE.short_desc: The Iron Mug Diner - back down to the clinking cups and scratched counter
COFFEE.traversal: You climb back down from the attic to the diner, dust-choked air giving way to the smell of fried food.

items.name: Bag of Coffee Beans
items.notice: The smell in The Iron Mug Diner: Attic is unmistakeable—you trace it to a Bag of Coffee Beans set just out of sight.

items.name: Hidden Ledger
items.notice: Leafing through a stack of papers in The Iron Mug Diner: Attic, you notice the edge of a Hidden Ledger that doesn't quite match the others.

check.notes: Sorting papers, checking spines and misfiled edges helps.

items.name: Dusty Trunk
items.notice: Your foot bumps something solid in The Iron Mug Diner: Attic; dust puffs up around a Dusty Trunk hidden behind crates.

check.notes: Look behind crates and under furniture.

items.name: Ledger Fragment
items.notice: You notice a Ledger Fragment tucked where anyone might find it.

npcs.name: Ellington Feint
npcs.dialogue: Secrets rust worse than iron. Do you have what I asked for?
npcs.flavor: A raised eyebrow says she already knows your secrets; she just wants proof.

world.name: The City: Snicket Block
world.description: A quiet block of narrow townhouses, cats on windowsills, and a newspaper stand that never closes.

CITY.short_desc: City Street - back to the busier avenue with changing signs
CITY.traversal: You walk west back to the main city street, cats watching your departure from their windowsill perches.

HOME.short_desc: Snicket Home Front Room - tidy space with mystery novels and annotations
HOME.traversal: You walk up to one of the narrow townhouses and step inside, cats observing from nearby windows.

WELL.short_desc: Neighborhood Well - old stone well with squeaky pulley and heavy bucket
WELL.traversal: You walk south toward the old stone well, cats scattering as your footsteps echo off the cobblestones.

MUSEUM.short_desc: City Museum - curiosity cabinet meets public school exhibit
MUSEUM.traversal: You head north to the city museum, glass cases already visible through the dusty windows.

items.name: Newspaper
items.notice: You notice a Newspaper nearby.

items.name: Umbrella
items.notice: You notice a Umbrella nearby.

world.name: Snicket Home: Front Room
world.description: A tidy room with a low sofa and a shelf of mystery novels with penciled annotations.

BLOCK.short_desc: Snicket Block - back to the quiet street with cats and newspaper stand
BLOCK.traversal: You step back out onto the quiet block, tidy mystery novels left behind.

STUDY.short_desc: Snicket Home Study - neat desk, locked drawer, and red thread pinboard
STUDY.traversal: You walk east to the study, mystery novels giving way to more serious investigative work.

items.name: House Key
items.notice: You notice a House Key nearby.

items.name: Penciled Novel
items.notice: You notice a Penciled Novel nearby.

world.name: Snicket Home: Study
world.description: A neat desk, a locked drawer, and a pinboard laced with red thread connecting names.

FRONT.short_desc: Snicket Home Front Room - back to the tidy sofa and penciled annotations
FRONT.traversal: You walk west back to the front room, leaving the red thread connections behind.

items.name: Pinned Clue
items.notice: You notice a Pinned Clue nearby.

items.name: Drawer Key
items.notice: You notice a Drawer Key nearby.

npcs.name: Quiet Neighbor
npcs.dialogue: I'm just returning this… unless you want to trade clues.
npcs.flavor: Appears whenever the kettle whistles, disappears when you ask for a name.

world.name: Neighborhood Well
world.description: An old stone well with a squeaky pulley and a bucket that's heavier than it looks.

BLOCK.short_desc: Snicket Block - back to the quiet townhouses and watchful cats
BLOCK.traversal: You walk north back to the block, squeaky pulley sounds fading behind you.

items.name: Old Coin
items.notice: You notice a Old Coin nearby.

items.name: Bucket
items.notice: You notice a Bucket nearby.

world.name: City Museum
world.description: A cross between a curiosity cabinet and public school exhibit—glass cases, dusty plaques, and a helpful docent.

BLOCK.short_desc: Snicket Block - back to the quiet street with newspaper stand
BLOCK.traversal: You walk south back to the block, glass cases and dusty plaques behind you.

items.name: Audio Guide
items.notice: You notice a Audio Guide nearby.

items.name: Map Brochure
items.notice: You notice a Map Brochure nearby.

npcs.name: Docent
npcs.dialogue: If you'd like a tour, press the green button. If you hear a buzzing, that was the wrong button.
npcs.flavor: She knows every dusty corner and loves a good question.

world.name: Ironhaven: Geothermal Relay Station (Exterior)
world.description: A squat concrete building marooned in the quarry pit. The doorway is ajar and the lintel bears eight faint pictographs: a key, a badge, a lantern, a coil of rope, goggles, a helmet, a scroll stamped with a seal, and an open ledger.

PATH.short_desc: Quarry Catwalk - back to the winding footpath of steel and cables
PATH.traversal: You walk west back across the quarry floor to the catwalk, eight pictographs watching your departure.

GENERATOR.short_desc: Relay Station Antechamber - circular room with eight brass sockets
GENERATOR.traversal: You step through the ajar doorway into the concrete building, eight pictographs echoing in brass sockets inside.

items.name: Chalk Rubbing of Pictographs
items.notice: You notice a Chalk Rubbing of Pictographs nearby.

items.name: Brass Socket Diagram
items.notice: The diagram is bolted beside the door, its symbols rubbed almost smooth by the wind.

world.name: Ironhaven: Relay Station Antechamber
world.description: A circular room hums with dormant power. Around the bulkhead, eight brass sockets match the pictographs outside. Each socket bears a symbol hinting at what appeases it: lock, staff sigil, flame, knot, snowburst, diving bell, warrant seal, ledger mark.

EXTERIOR.short_desc: Geothermal Relay Station Exterior - back to the squat concrete building
EXTERIOR.traversal: You step back through the doorway to the exterior, brass sockets humming behind you.

PORTAL.blocked_text: The bulkhead stays dark. Around its rim, the eight sockets remain unlit: a suitable key, staff credentials, a living light, climbing rig, cold-weather goggles, a pressurized rig, a signed writ, and a ledger entry.
PORTAL.short_desc: Parallel Relay Portal - mirrors showing a version of you that is nearly you
PORTAL.traversal: The eight sockets glow as your items satisfy their requirements, and the bulkhead iris opens to reveal a shimmering portal where mirrors show an almost-you.

world.name: Ironhaven: Parallel Relay Portal
world.description: The air ripples like heat above pavement. A ring of mirrors shows a version of you that is very nearly you. Step through to return where you began—though something important will be different.

ANTECHAMBER.blocked_text: The bulkhead stays dark. Around its rim, the eight sockets remain unlit: a suitable key, staff credentials, a living light, climbing rig, cold-weather goggles, a pressurized rig, a signed writ, and a ledger entry.
ANTECHAMBER.short_desc: Relay Station Antechamber - back to the circular room with eight brass sockets
ANTECHAMBER.traversal: You step back through the shimmering portal to the antechamber, mirrors of almost-you rippling behind you.

world.name: Ironhaven: Shift Change Kiosk
world.description: A plywood kiosk with a hand-painted sign: LOST (and sometimes FOUND). A slatted counter displays a jumble of workers' forgotten effects.

STREET.short_desc: Main Street (Ironhaven) - back to the shuttered storefronts and creaking signs
STREET.traversal: You walk west back to Main Street, leaving the jumble of industrial detritus behind.

meta.note: Graph designed for traversal; exits use single-word mnemonics with short descriptions and atmospheric traversal text.

search_checks.advantage_rule: If player inventory grants any type listed in advantage_if_types, roll with advantage or reduce DC in your system.
search_checks.notes: Item objects include a 'check' field with {skill, dc, advantage_if_types, disadvantage_if_missing_types, notes}.

meta.exit_blocked_text: Each exit object includes a 'blocked_text' shown when requirements are not met.

parallel_portal.on_enter_behavior: Return player to their ORIGINAL starting room (engine should override the destination id) and assign a new secret objective tracked out-of-band.

interactions.notice: The light flickers, dies, but then starts up again.
interactions.notes: A battered lantern shines brightly.

interactions.notice: With a satisfying click, the grappling hook is securely fastened to the rope.
interactions.notes: A sturdy grappling line, ready for climbing or descending.

interactions.notice: You hear a hiss of compressed air as the oxygen tank connects to the diving helmet.
interactions.notes: A complete pressurized rig, suitable for underwater exploration.

interactions.notice: As you cross-reference the symbols, the ciphered message begins to reveal its secrets.
interactions.notes: The once-incomprehensible message is now clear.

interactions.notice: The antidote sizzles as it makes contact with the mycelium, rendering it inert.
interactions.notes: The dangerous spores have been neutralized.

interactions.notice: Placing the ledger in the slot, you hear a faint click as a hidden compartment opens.
interactions.notes: A secret has been revealed.

interactions.notice: Using the index card and map, you quickly pinpoint the location of the needed file.
interactions.notes: The file's location is now known.

interactions.notice: The rich aroma of coffee fills the air as you prepare a fresh brew.
interactions.notes: A steaming, freshly brewed cup of coffee.

interactions.notice: With a satisfying click, the grappling hook is securely fastened to the rope.
interactions.notes: A sturdy grappling line, ready for climbing or descending.

interactions.notice: The compressed air tank attaches firmly to the hardhat, creating a makeshift respirator.
interactions.notes: Provides a supply of clean air in hazardous environments.

interactions.notice: Flipping through the maintenance manual, you find the key to decipher the message's code.
interactions.notes: The hidden meaning is now understood.

interactions.notice: The antidote sizzles as it makes contact with the mycelium, rendering it inert.
interactions.notes: The dangerous spores have been neutralized.

interactions.notice: The shift logbook fits perfectly into the slot, triggering a hidden mechanism.
interactions.notes: A secret compartment is now accessible.

interactions.notice: Using the index card and map, you quickly pinpoint the location of the needed file.
interactions.notes: The file's location is now known.

interactions.notice: You pour the steaming house roast into the mug, its comforting scent promising a moment of clarity.
interactions.notes: A hot cup of coffee, ready to go.

interactions.notice: The helmet seals onto the suit with a pressurized hiss, and life support indicators glow green.
interactions.notes: A suit ready for extra-vehicular activity.

interactions.notice: The obscure codes in the message match a section in the colony operations manual, revealing their true meaning.
interactions.notes: The operational directive is now clear.

interactions.notice: As you slide the hydroponics log into the empty slot, a section of the wall recedes.
interactions.notes: A hidden space has been uncovered.

interactions.notice: The aroma of freshly roasted beans is potent as you prepare the brew in your thermal mug.
interactions.notes: A well-insulated mug of hot coffee.

interactions.notice: The air tank connects to the diver's helmet with a reassuring clank, ready for the depths.
interactions.notes: A complete diving rig for underwater ventures.

interactions.notice: You find a similar cipher in the old casebook, allowing you to quickly decode the message.
interactions.notes: The clue within the message is now readable.

interactions.notice: The ledger slides into place, and a section of the floor pops open with a dull thud.
interactions.notes: A secret compartment has been found.

interactions.notice: You prepare a strong shot of espresso, the dark, rich liquid filling the paper cup.
interactions.notes: A potent brew to sharpen the senses.

interactions.notice: The air can locks into the helmet, pressurizing the suit for extreme environments.
interactions.notes: A suit designed to withstand immense pressure.

interactions.notice: Cross-referencing the message with the exploit manual, the encoded instructions become clear.
interactions.notes: The message's technical secret is revealed.

interactions.notice: The shard ledger fits the slot, and a hidden drawer springs open.
interactions.notes: A secret compartment is now open.

interactions.notice: You brew the soykaf in the noodle cup, creating a surprisingly palatable, hot beverage.
interactions.notes: A makeshift cup of hot soykaf.
